main event: On multiple occasions in June 1966, witnesses reported sightings of unidentified aerial phenomena over Columbus, Ohio, describing them as bright, colored lights moving in the night sky.
interesting points: Witnesses noted a high-pitched humming sound associated with the sightings,The objects appeared to change colors, including orange and red, during their movements,Multiple witnesses reported observing the same object, contributing to the credibility of the sightings,One observation lasted approximately 20 minutes before the object moved out of sight, The Air Force concluded that some of the sightings could potentially be explained as military or civil aircraft.
sighted object: bright, silvery-colored object and moving lights
witness description: Civilians who observed the objects during the night.
